mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.qyid AS "qyid", a.userid AS "userid", a.qymc AS "qymc", a.zzjgdm AS "zzjgdm", a.yyzzzch AS "yyzzzch", a.khyh AS "khyh", a.yhzh AS "yhzh", a.sfsyq AS "sfsyq", a.gcjsry_zs AS "gcjsryZs", a.gcjsry_gjzcrs AS "gcjsryGjzcrs", a.gcjsry_zjzcrs AS "gcjsryZjzcrs", a.sylxid AS "sylxid", a.sylx AS "sylx", a.provinceid AS "provinceid", a.province AS "province", a.cityid AS "cityid", a.city AS "city", a.countyid AS "countyid", a.county AS "county", a.zcdd AS "zcdd", a.jjxzid AS "jjxzid", a.jjxz AS "jjxz", a.zczb AS "zczb", a.zyfw AS "zyfw", a.jyfw AS "jyfw", a.clrq AS "clrq", a.qyjj AS "qyjj", a.xxdd AS "xxdd", a.yzbm AS "yzbm", a.cz AS "cz", a.email AS "email", a.webaddress AS "webaddress", a.lxr AS "lxr", a.lxdh AS "lxdh", a.fddbr_ryid AS "fddbrRyid", a.fddbr AS "fddbr", a.qyfzr_ryid AS "qyfzrRyid", a.qyfzr AS "qyfzr", a.cwfzr_ryid AS "cwfzrRyid", a.cwfzr AS "cwfzr", a.jsfzr_ryid AS "jsfzrRyid", a.jsfzr AS "jsfzr", a.aqfzr_ryid AS "aqfzrRyid", a.aqfzr AS "aqfzr", a.datastate AS "datastate", a.tag AS "tag", a.xgr AS "xgr", a.xgrqsj AS "xgrqsj", a.xmjlzs AS "xmjlzs", a.aqy AS "aqy", a.zjy AS "zjy", a.sgy AS "sgy", a.tyshxydm AS "tyshxydm", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WJSJZX.dbo.corp_basic_info_application( qyid, qymc, zzjgdm, yyzzzch, khyh, yhzh, sfsyq, gcjsry_zs, gcjsry_gjzcrs, gcjsry_zjzcrs, sylxid, sylx, provinceid, province, cityid, city, countyid, county, zcdd, jjxzid, jjxz, zczb, zyfw, jyfw, clrq, qyjj, xxdd, yzbm, cz, email, webaddress, lxr, lxdh, fddbr_ryid, fddbr, qyfzr_ryid, qyfzr, cwfzr_ryid, cwfzr, jsfzr_ryid, jsfzr, aqfzr_ryid, aqfzr, datastate, tag, xgr, xgrqsj, xmjlzs, aqy, zjy, sgy, tyshxydm, proc_ins_id ) VALUES ( #{qyid}, #{qymc}, #{zzjgdm}, #{yyzzzch}, #{khyh}, #{yhzh}, #{sfsyq}, #{gcjsryZs}, #{gcjsryGjzcrs}, #{gcjsryZjzcrs}, #{sylxid}, #{sylx}, #{provinceid}, #{province}, #{cityid}, #{city}, #{countyid}, #{county}, #{zcdd}, #{jjxzid}, #{jjxz}, #{zczb}, #{zyfw}, #{jyfw}, #{clrq}, #{qyjj}, #{xxdd}, #{yzbm}, #{cz}, #{email}, #{webaddress}, #{lxr}, #{lxdh}, #{fddbrRyid}, #{fddbr}, #{qyfzrRyid}, #{qyfzr}, #{cwfzrRyid}, #{cwfzr}, #{jsfzrRyid}, #{jsfzr}, #{aqfzrRyid}, #{aqfzr}, #{datastate}, #{tag}, #{xgr}, #{xgrqsj}, #{xmjlzs}, #{aqy}, #{zjy}, #{sgy}, #{tyshxydm}, #{procInsId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE WJSJZX.dbo.corp_basic_info_application SET qymc = #{qymc}, zzjgdm = #{zzjgdm}, yyzzzch = #{yyzzzch}, khyh = #{khyh}, yhzh = #{yhzh}, sfsyq = #{sfsyq}, gcjsry_zs = #{gcjsryZs}, gcjsry_gjzcrs = #{gcjsryGjzcrs}, gcjsry_zjzcrs = #{gcjsryZjzcrs}, sylxid = #{sylxid}, sylx = #{sylx}, provinceid = #{provinceid}, province = #{province}, cityid = #{cityid}, city = #{city}, countyid = #{countyid}, county = #{county}, zcdd = #{zcdd}, jjxzid = #{jjxzid}, jjxz = #{jjxz}, zczb = #{zczb}, zyfw = #{zyfw}, jyfw = #{jyfw}, clrq = #{clrq}, qyjj = #{qyjj}, xxdd = #{xxdd}, yzbm = #{yzbm}, cz = #{cz}, email = #{email}, webaddress = #{webaddress}, lxr = #{lxr}, lxdh = #{lxdh}, fddbr_ryid = #{fddbrRyid}, fddbr = #{fddbr}, qyfzr_ryid = #{qyfzrRyid}, qyfzr = #{qyfzr}, cwfzr_ryid = #{cwfzrRyid}, cwfzr = #{cwfzr}, jsfzr_ryid = #{jsfzrRyid}, jsfzr = #{jsfzr}, aqfzr_ryid = #{aqfzrRyid}, aqfzr = #{aqfzr}, datastate = #{datastate}, tag = #{tag}, xgr = #{xgr}, xgrqsj = #{xgrqsj}, xmjlzs = #{xmjlzs}, aqy = #{aqy}, zjy = #{zjy}, sgy = #{sgy}, tyshxydm = #{tyshxydm}, proc_ins_id = #{procInsId} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM WJSJZX.dbo.corp_basic_info_application WHERE qyID = #{qyid} AND proc_ins_id = #{procInsId} AND DataState = '0'
